meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Sara Leiber McKinney Art Burke Craig Campbell Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1061.

td.p: Sara Leiber McKinney, a teacher originally from Yonkers, New York
Art Burke, an analyst from Lenexa, Kansas
Craig Campbell, an advertising executive from Victorville, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $999)

tr.td: 20th C. QUOTES
A. K. A.
ZOOS
OPERA
COOKING
TV GUIDE SAYS
(Alex: These are plot breakdowns as they appeared in TV Guide & all you have to do is to identify the correct TV series or program.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'A remark attributed to Eldridge Cleaver states, "You\'re either part of the solution or part of" this')

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
